item.title: OpenAI, SoftBank invest $1 billion in SB Energy as Stargate buildout expands
item.description: OpenAI and SoftBank Group will jointly invest $1 billion in SB Energy, a SoftBank-owned provider of data-center and power infrastructure, as part of their $500 billion Stargate initiative aimed at building out AI infrastructure.

item.title: Stellantis scraps US plug-in hybrid sales, citing weak demand
item.description: Chrysler parent Stellantis said on Friday it will stop selling plug-in hybrid versions of the Jeep Wrangler and Grand Cherokee, and the Chrysler Pacifica minivan, in the United States as it navigates soft demand and shifts its North American electrification strategy.

item.title: Fed's Bostic says high inflation still central bank's main challenge -radio interview
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔·博斯蒂克周五在电台访谈中表示，通胀问题仍是其经济关切的核心焦点。他同时指出，在更广泛的不确定性背景下，就业市场仍处于低招聘、零裁员的状态。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said on Friday in a radio interview inflation issues are still at the forefront of his economic concerns, in comments that added the job market continues to be in a low-hire, no-fire mode amid broader uncertainties.】

item.title: 阿根廷已就货币互换协议向美国偿还债务
item.description: Argentina has repaid the United States for a currency swap framework it provided to the South American country last year to stabilize its economy, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and Argentina's central bank said on Friday.

item.title: 美联储数据显示，2025年第三季度美国家庭财富创历史新高
item.description: 美联储周五公布的数据显示，在股市人工智能热潮和房价持续上涨的推动下，2025年第三季度美国家庭财富达到创纪录的180万亿美元以上。【原文：U.S. household wealth hit a record high of more than $180 trillion in the third quarter of 2025 on the back of an AI-boom in the stock market and continued gains in home prices, data from the Federal Reserve showed on Friday.】

item.title: 美联储任命地区银行董事会主席和副主席
item.description: The Federal Reserve Board on Friday announced the chairs and vice chairs of its 12 regional banks for this year, a list that includes Emerson Electric Co's chief executive Lal Karsanbhai as chair of the St. Louis Fed, and Liberty Mutual Insurance CEO Tim Sweeney as deputy chair of the Boston Fed.

item.title: 华尔街争相为力拓-嘉能可交易提供咨询，瞄准1亿美元佣金
item.description: Rio Tinto's ambition to acquire Glencore and create the world's largest mining company worth more than $200 billion could see Wall Street advisers share more than $100 million in fees.

item.title: 委内瑞拉债券持有人团体寻求授权启动债务重组谈判
item.description: A key group of Venezuelan bondholders said on Friday they were ready to start debt restructuring talks with the country once authorisation for such discussions was granted.

item.title: 白宫就委内瑞拉问题召开石油会议，与会者包括独立人士，且与丹佛存在密切联系
item.description: The White House is summoning oil executives to discuss potential investment in Venezuela on Friday, and while a preliminary list of attendees features the big names of American oil - Chevron , Exxon Mobil and ConocoPhillips - it also includes several smaller independents and private equity-backed players.

item.title: Mercosur bloc to sign EU trade deal on January 17
item.description: 阿根廷外交部周五表示，南方共同市场将于1月17日与欧盟签署长期延宕的贸易协定，标志着历经多年谈判后取得重大突破。【原文：The Mercosur bloc will sign its long-delayed trade agreement with the European Union on January 17, Argentina’s foreign ministry said Friday, marking a breakthrough after years of negotiations.】

item.title: 财政部在明尼苏达州欺诈调查期间通知部分企业，贝森特称
item.description: 美国财政部金融犯罪执法网络（FinCEN）已通知部分企业，因涉嫌利用新冠疫情期间的税收优惠政策实施欺诈行为，这些企业正接受调查。财政部长斯科特·贝森特周五表示。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department's Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) has notified some businesses that they are under investigation for alleged fraud involving COVID-era tax incentives, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Friday.】

item.title: 银行瞄准委内瑞拉投资，摩根大通被认为具有优势
item.description: 美国在委内瑞拉石油领域的介入为国际银行提供了潜在机遇，其中摩根大通凭借其在该国的深厚历史积淀及过往参与国际贸易融资的经验，占据了有利地位。【原文：The U.S. involvement in Venezuela's oil sector offers a potential opportunity for international banks, with JPMorgan Chase in an advantageous spot due to its history in the country and past involvement with international trade financing.】

item.title: Democratic senators demand Apple, Google take X and Grok off app stores over sexual images
item.description: 三名美国民主党参议员呼吁苹果公司和谷歌母公司Alphabet将X平台及其内置聊天机器人Grok从各自应用商店下架，原因是该平台上存在大量未经同意传播的女性和未成年人性影像。【原文：Three Democratic U.S. senators are calling on Apple and Alphabet's Google to remove X and its built-in chabot Grok from their respective app stores over the spread of nonconsensual sexual images of women and minors on the platform.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普承诺制造业将蓬勃发展，美国工厂员工人数仍在下降
item.description: 去年12月，美国制造业就业岗位延续了自去年春季以来的连续八个月下滑态势。此前，特朗普总统推行了激进的进口关税政策，他曾承诺此举将通过重塑全球贸易格局以利于美国工人，从而推动蓝领岗位复苏。【原文：U.S. manufacturing jobs in December continued an eight-month skid that began last spring after President Donald Trump rolled out aggressive import taxes that he pledged would lead to a resurgence of blue-collar jobs by reshuffling world trade to favor U.S. workers.】

item.title: 特朗普似乎提前发布了部分就业数据。
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周四晚间在其社交媒体账户上发布了一张图表，其中包含的就业市场数据直至周五上午才正式公布。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump posted a chart on his social media account late Thursday that included job-market data that was not publicly released until Friday morning.】

item.title: 医疗行业并购专家齐聚旧金山，期待2026年迎来巨额并购交易
item.description: 据十余位顶级银行家和律师透露，医疗保健领域的交易撮合者本周末将齐聚旧金山，押注2026年将掀起新一轮巨额并购浪潮。届时行业规模或将超越2019年和2021年——这两年该领域并购交易总额曾逼近5000亿美元，堪称行业巅峰。【原文：Healthcare dealmakers are heading to San Francisco this weekend betting on a new wave of mega-mergers in 2026 that could eclipse the industry’s standout years of 2019 and 2021 when such tie-ups approached half a trillion dollars, according to more than a dozen top bankers and lawyers.】

item.title: Trump's order for Freddie, Fannie to buy $200 billion mortgage bonds raises IPO doubts
item.description: 分析人士指出，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普要求房利美和房地美购买2000亿美元抵押贷款债券的命令，引发了对其私有化计划的质疑。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's order for Freddie Mac and Fannie Mae to buy $200 billion in mortgage bonds raises doubts about their privatization plans, analysts say.】

item.title: Glencore's trading arm part of the appeal for Rio Tinto in merger talks, sources say
item.description: Rio Tinto would want to keep Glencore's trading division and make it an even more powerful platform to sell commodities if the two can strike a deal to create the world's largest mining company, two sources close to the matter said.

item.title: 美国消费者信心在一月初有所回升
item.description: 一项调查显示，1月初美国消费者信心有所回升，但家庭仍持续担忧通胀和劳动力市场疲软。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment perked up in early January, but households continued to worry about inflation and a weakening labor market, a survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 向美国政府提起关税退税诉讼的跨国公司
item.description: Thousands of companies around the world have filed lawsuits challenging U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs and sought refunds on duties paid.

item.title: US equity funds see weekly outflows on geopolitical, rate worries
item.description: 截至1月7日的七天内，美国股票基金遭遇大规模资金流出，投资者因全球紧张局势加剧而转为谨慎，同时美国就业报告即将发布——该报告被视为影响美联储利率前景的关键因素之一。【原文：U.S. equity funds saw sizeable outflows in the seven days through January 7, as investors turned cautious over deepening global tensions and ahead of the U.S. jobs report, seen as one of the factors influencing the Federal Reserve’s rate outlook.】

item.title: Saks Global seeks to file for bankruptcy as soon as Sunday, Bloomberg News reports
item.description: 彭博新闻周五援引知情人士消息报道，奢侈品零售商萨克斯全球公司计划最早于本周日申请第11章破产保护。【原文：Luxury retailer Saks Global is planning to file for Chapter 11 bankruptcy as soon as Sunday, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Fed seen on longer rate-cut pause after jobs data
item.description: 美国失业率的下降可能缓解美联储对劳动力市场疲软的担忧，并为更长时间维持政策利率提供依据。交易员押注美联储将等到6月才重启降息。【原文：A drop in the U.S. unemployment rate may ease concerns at the Federal Reserve about labor market weakness and build the case for a longer hold on the policy rate, with traders betting the central bank will wait until June to resume reductions.】

item.title: Amazon Pharmacy starts offering Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight-loss pill
item.description: Amazon Pharmacy said on Friday it now offers Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight-loss pill through insurance plans as well as through a cash-pay option.

item.title: Instant view: US job growth slows in December, backs Fed rate pause this month
item.description: 12月美国就业增长放缓幅度超出预期，企业因进口关税和人工智能投资增加而谨慎招聘，但失业率降至4.4%，这支持了市场预期美联储本月将维持利率不变。【原文：U.S. job growth slowed more than expected in December amid business caution about hiring because of import tariffs and rising artificial intelligence investment, but the unemployment rate dipped to 4.4%, supporting expectations the Federal Reserve would leave interest rates unchanged this month.】

item.title: 贝恩资本支持的鲍勃折扣家具公司申请在美国上市
item.description: Furniture store chain Bob's Discount Furniture, backed by private equity firm Bain Capital, filed for an initial public offering in the United States on Friday.

item.title: 全球股票基金结束连续三周资金流入
item.description: 截至1月7日当周，全球股票基金录得三周来首次资金净流出，投资者因地缘政治担忧、美国利率不确定性及估值过高（尤其美国股市）而削减风险敞口。【原文：Global equity funds recorded their first weekly outflow in three weeks in the week through January 7 as investors trimmed risk on geopolitical concerns, U.S. rate uncertainty and stretched valuations, especially in U.S. stocks.】

item.title: 美国10月独栋住宅开工量回升，建筑许可量下滑
item.description: U.S. single-family homebuilding rebounded in October, but permits for future construction eased, signaling caution among builders as new housing inventory remains high and demand soft.

item.title: DeepSeek to launch new AI model focused on coding in February, The Information reports
item.description: 据《The Information》周五报道，知情人士透露，中国人工智能初创企业DeepSeek预计将于2月推出新一代人工智能模型V4，该模型具备强大的编程能力。【原文：Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is expected to launch its next-generation AI model V4 that features strong coding capabilities in February, The Information reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国计划采取措施打击有害的人工智能图像篡改行为
item.description: Germany's justice ministry plans to present measures in the near future that would allow authorities to more effectively combat the use of artificial intelligence to manipulate images in ways that violate personal rights, a spokesperson said on Friday.
